CHAT_MAPPING.description: Mapping between source and target channels (with their IDs (-100...)). Example: [-100source1,-100source2:-100target];[-100source3:-100target2];

REMOVE_URLS.description: Remove URLs from incoming messages (true or false). Defaults to false

REMOVE_URLS_LIST.description: Comma-separated list of URLs to remove (reddit.com,youtube.com)

REMOVE_URLS_WL.description: Comma-separated list of URLs to exclude from removal (google.com,twitter.com). Will be applied after the REMOVE_URLS_LIST

DISABLE_DELETE.description: Disable mirror message deleting (true or false). Defaults to false

DISABLE_EDIT.description: Disable mirror message editing (true or false). Defaults to false

USE_MEMORY_DB.description: Use an in-memory database instead of Postgres DB (true or false). Defaults to false

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level (debug, info, warning, error or critical). Defaults to info
